name: The Institute of Physics
goal:
The Institute of Physics is a leading scientific society. We are a charitable organisation with a worldwide membership of more than 50,000, working together to advance physics education, research and application.

We engage with policymakers and the general public to develop awareness and understanding of the value of physics and, through IOP Publishing, we are world leaders in professional scientific communications.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Horizon 2020 and other Framework Programmes
Developments and legislature affecting science and research access and funding, energy, education, or related areas.
